transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Good afternoon, ma'am.
Executive: Very good afternoon sir, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Good.
Executive: Great. Actually sir, aapke ye account abhi mere paas dobara hand over hua hai. Aapne recently services li thi na MDC ke plan ki?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Wo aapki live ho gayi thi. To abhi aap, aap khud hi use kar rahe hain sir, services?
Customer: Ji ma'am. Abhi to matlab main aisa koi khas use nahi kar raha tha bas abhi renew hua tha to to karunga matlab ab aage.
Executive: Hai na? Abhi use karna shuru kariye. Don't worry sir, don't worry. Par aap usko dheere dheere use karna shuru kariyega. Although maine check kiya tha last two weeks mein aapne kuch saat aath lead ek last week to 10 lead bhi uthai thi aapne, correct?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To theek hai sir, jitna bhi matlab is week mein ek bhi lead use nahi hui hai. To thoda sa aap check kar lena. Baki sir ek na complaint aayi hui hai aapki wo shayad pehle bhi aayi thi dobara reopen hui hai. Palak naam se customer hai. Kya issue hai sir iska?
Customer: Ma'am, inka material jo hai mere paas se chala gaya tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ji. Mere paas se to chala gaya tha lekin ji. 24 headbed ka product liya tha to unhone cup and saucer ka.
Executive: 24 headbed ka product liya tha to unhone cup and saucer ka.
Customer: Ah, pehle in inke do product the ek mugs the aur ek cup and saucer the.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ah, wo dono hi chale gaye the mere paas se. Lekin ek jo hai ek jo hai wo transport par reh gaya tha inka.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Theek hai wo maine wapas maine wapas manga kar DTDC se bheja dobara. Theek hai DTDC ne inka address confirm nahi kiya wo abhi tak bhi DTDC par hi hai uski call mere paas aati hai regular. Matlab kuch time mein aa jati hai.
Executive: Achha to abhi wo product DTDC mein atka hua hai. Aapke paas update nahi hai uska?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To wo kya keh rahe hain sir matlab atka kyun hua hai? Kya issue aa raha hai? Address ka hi problem hai bas?
Customer: Nahi, asal ye receive nahi karna chahte use.
Executive: Kyun?
Customer: Ye to mujhe nahi pata. Mujhse to baat bhi nahi hui inki. DTDC wala hi bol raha tha ki maine unse bola tha address confirm kar dijiye to wo bol rahe the ki main call karke batati hu. Uske baad koi call nahi aaya.
Executive: Achha. Unka yaha pe dobara se ticket aaya hai to wo bol rahi hai ki complaint close kyun kar di aapne? Unko to unka product hi receive nahi hua hai to unko dobara complaint open karwani hai. To yaha pe dobara se complaint open hui hai iski.
Customer: To aap ek kaam kariye na sir.
Executive: Main isme kya kar sakta hu? Ji bataiye.
Executive: Aap ek kaam kariye. Aap Palak se baat kariye ki aap DTDC se kyun order confirm nahi kar rahi hai? Aapki taraf se to sari jo bhi formalities and sari cheeze wo aap kar chuke hai apni taraf se, right?
Customer: Meri meri taraf se to ja chuka hai na. Meri taraf se to sari cheeze confirm ho gayi hai.
Executive: To aap ek baar Palak se baat kariye. Jo aapke customer hai.
Customer: Ha, aapki taraf se ja chuka hai, sab samajh gayi. Ji. Samajh gayi aapki baat main. Aapki taraf se ja chuka hai lekin aapke sath deal hui hai sir customer ki to aapko apni taraf se usko batani hai na. Ab yaha pe internal ticket aapke account pe open hai.
Customer: Chaliye ma'am baat kar leta hu unse.
Executive: Hai na? Kyunki yaha par jab bhi koi internal ticket open hota hai buyer supplier conflict ki wajah se to us cheez ko legal team internally check karti hai sir. Aur bahot zyada buyer supplier conflict aate hain to fir hamare account mein hi demote hoti hai services. Right? Ab aapke end se to sari cheeze clear hai. Main to mujhe sir aapka account present karna hai, right? To main to apni IndiaMART team ko bata dungi ki mere client ki taraf se sari formalities okay hai, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To wo sari cheeze okay kar denge but still waha pe jab main unko bolungi na ki mere client se to sab okay kar diya but DTDC pe atka hua hai. To jab tak aapka product buyer tak ja nahi pahunch nahi pata tab tak aap uske sath touch mein raha kariye sir. Theek hai na? So that wo negative rating na de aapko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai na? Abhi to dekhiye account hamara live hua hi hai just abhi hua hai live. To I just want ki sari cheeze positive note pe hi chale koi bhi as such issue na aaye. Kyunki last abhi to sir aapka account kafi time se to band nahi raha mujhe jaisa yaad hai. Last kab band hua tha apna account sir?
Customer: Ma'am, June July mein account do hafte ke liye band raha tha.
Executive: Achha bas do hi hafte ke liye band raha tha kya?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Uske baad renew ho gaya tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai koi baat nahi jaisa bhi hai. Main yaha pe apni team ko update de rahi hu ki mere client ki taraf se sari cheeze okay hai. Baki sir aap mujhe koi dispatch achha kaun sa product nahi pahuncha sir uska?
Customer: Cup and saucer.
Executive: Cup and saucer nahi pahuncha tha aur dusra bottle bata rahe the na aap?
Customer: Mug mug mug pahunch gaya.
Executive: Mug mug. Mug pahunch gaya aur cup and saucer nahi pahuncha hai. Theek hai to main apni team ko update de deti hu mug pahunch chuka hai cup and saucer nahi pahuncha aur wo DTDC pe atka hua hai and buyer is not ah accepting the product from DTDC. To wo kya bol rahe hain sir wapas matlab aapko dene ko bol rahe hain refund mang rahe hain kya bol rahe hain?
Customer: Mujhse mujhse to un wo baat hi nahi kar rahi. Mujhse koi aur baat kar raha tha Atul Maharaj naam se koi banda tha. Maine unhe ye bataya tha ki bhai DTDC par hai aap maine number bhi provide kara diya aap apna address confirm kara dijiye ek bar product aapka pahunch jayega. Lekin unhone matlab call bhi ki thi DTDC wale ne Palak ko Palak madam ko call ki thi. Unhone bola ki main aapko call karke batati hu aur uske baad koi return call nahi gaya.
Executive: Koi baat nahi ek bar aap Palak se baat kar lijiye ki ye ye issue hai aap dobara complaint kyun open karwai hai. Theek hai na?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aap internally discuss kar lo jaisa bhi hota hai aap mujhe batana sir.
Customer: Okay ma'am.
Executive: Okay okay sir. Thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product delivery stuck with DTDC.

- Buyer reopened complaint due to non-receipt of product.



Resolution:

- Executive advised customer to contact buyer.

- Executive updated team about the product dispatch status.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with buyer and update executive.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- delivery, complaint, dtdc, product, buyer
